channel.title: Donator chest
channel.description:
hey everyone. My question is does anyone know how to make a switcher for Donator chest. like you got blue party hat, torva, bones in the chest. that it will give you 1:50 torva or party hat.
rep++

item.description:

You could start with adding torva to your server and then make a simple method with chance rates for the items.
